Container.Name: kavitabot
Container.Overview:
This is a Discord bot that users in your discord server can use to interact with your private Kavita server. It's primary purpose is to allow for user requested Kavita invitiations through Discord. More functionality may come later.
There are various ways to set the permissions of your bot and you should see what works with the least permissions, but if you'd rather keep it simple: - Name & customize the bot - Enable the three "Presence Gateway Intents" under "Bot" - Click Oauth2 and enable "Bot" in the "OAuth2 URL Generator" section - Use "Generated URL" at the bottom of the page to invite your bot to the server

Config.Name: KAVITA_OPDS_URL
Config.Description: Enter your Kavita OPDS URL. Found at: Settings > API Key / OPDS > OPDS URL

Config.Name: DISCORD_SVR_ID
Config.Description: Enter your Discord server ID. This is used to force update the commands on startup.

Config.Name: DISCORD_CHAN_ID
Config.Description: (optional) Enter your Discord chanel ID to restrict the commands to a specific channel.

Config.Name: DISCORD_ROLE_ID
Config.Description: (optional) Enter your Discord role ID to restrict the commands to a specific role.
